body.name: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Love at First To Foam Sulfate Free Shampoo with Aloe and Micellar Water, Paraben Free, Silicone Free, Micellar Shampoo for Kinky, Curly Hair, 16.9 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - March 4 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Carol’s Daughter Wash Day Delight Micellar shampoo with Aloe for hair transforms from a water to a gentle foam lather for a deep clean quickly without stripping or harsh friction to help cut down time on wash day

Cleanses Hair Quickly – Perfect for curly hair, kinky hair and coily hair, our targeted applicator helps the liquid formula instantly flow through hair providing easy scalp access and quickly rinses clean
Reduces time to detangle hair – Sulfate free shampoo transforms from a liquid into a gentle foam lather without harsh friction and effortlessly works throughout, minimizing tangles

Doesn't strip hair - Sulfate free shampoo for curly hair with Micellar Water acts like a magnet to attract and lift away buildup for a thorough hair and scalp cleanse without stripping hair - Follow with conditioner

Made With Love: Carol's Daughter was born in a Brooklyn kitchen in 1993 and made with a mother's love and encouragement; Today we carry a full line of hair care products and body and skin care products
body.description: Reimagine your wash day with our water-to-foam shampoo made with Aloe. Our Liquid Micellar technology acts like a magnet to attract and lift away buildup for a thorough scalp and hair cleanse without leaving hair feeling stripped. The targeted liquid formula provides easy scalp access as it instantly flows through hair and transforms into a gentle foam lather without harsh friction. It effortlessly works throughout, minimizing tangles and quickly rinses clean so there's no added weight from residue left behind. After one wash, scalp and hair feel clean, and hair feels soft and moisturized. One wash changes everything. We consider an ingredient to be naturally derived if it is unchanged from its natural state or has undergone processing yet still retains greater than 50 percent of its molecular structure from its original natural source.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Microlocs/Sisterlocks
reviews.reviewText: I gave 5 stars for moisture and softness because it IS THE PERFECT AMOUNT of EACH FOR my MICROLOCS! I chose the product specifically for my microlocs after seeing it highly recommended and demonstrated by several influencers on YouTube. A LITTLE goes a long way!! One bottle lasted 2.5 months doing 2 shampoos weekly!!! The "water" consistency distributes fast and easy throughout my locs. It lathers really well but rinses out surprisingly well too. Wash Day Delight (Aloe) is now my weekly shampoo I've used exclusively for 4 months. I also LOVE the super fresh scent that leaves a light fresh "whiff" 1-2 days after shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have sisterlocks and was looking for something I can still use similar to the starter shampoo. This worked well! It cleans the scalp and is not heavy. Leaves no residue but still seems to have some moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for wash days…and makeup brushes
reviews.reviewText: This is a great wash-day when I want to clarify by hair/scalp. The pointed nozzle makes it convenient to get at your scalp. I use one of those rubber shampooing b brushes to make this liquid turn into foam—is quite refreshing.Additionally, I’ve found this works great to clean my makeup brushes. It foams to shampoo the brushes and smells nice. And… a better value than most brush cleaners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elevate hair care
reviews.reviewText: Experience the ultimate hair care with this exceptional shampoo that goes beyond cleansing. Formulated with nourishing ingredients, it leaves your hair feeling refreshed and revitalized. The gentle, sulfate-free formula ensures a thorough cleanse without stripping your hair of its natural oils. Say goodbye to parabens and silicones, as this shampoo is crafted to provide a clean, worry-free experience. Suitable for various hair types, it leaves your locks feeling soft, manageable, and infused with a delightful fragrance. Elevate your hair care routine with this exceptional shampoo for a pampering experience every wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product works great for my 4c, low-porosity hair which can be prone to build up! I use this once a month, not weekly as it strips all nutrients from your hair. After using this, it is a must that you deep condition effectively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Micellar Shampoo And Gel Conditioner, Game changer!
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff, it can be initially applied with no added water because it is a micellar water shampoo it lathers all on it’s own. Of course adding water is ideal, but not entirely necessary. Can be used standing up or even sitting in a chair! It’s not messy or runny at all and doesn’t drip. My daughter uses it as she’s learning to wash her own hair in the shower so it’s great for kids learning independence to use on their own. It’s way different and less messy than traditional shampoo. It does seem to have clarifying properties, so it’s not as moisturizing, but after using the Wash Day Delight conditioner which is a gel, my hair was moisturized with good slip. A very good leave in conditioner was needed afterward to maintain maximum moisture and I seal with oil. I love this set and I love the smell! Makes a great addition to your child’s personal care items because they aren’t creamy and drippy so the chances of shampoo and conditioner getting in their eyes is no worry at all. I will purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: I have fine oily hair and also scalp psoriasis. This has helped my hair tremendously. Not only is the scent fresh and amazing, it makes my hair feel soft and clean. I use this as my first shampoo and follow up with another styling shampoo. I also absolutely adore the conditioner that is under this same brand name. It allows my hair to be completely tangle free when I get out of the shower and it doesn’t weigh it down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh. I wanted to like it,
reviews.reviewText: and I understand intellectually that sudsing doesn't equal cleansing, but I just don't find the watery texture satisfying. In all fairness, I guess it gets the hair clean, but I won't buy it again.

Tout d'abord, je tiens à préciser qu'il ne s'agit pas d'un shampooing de tous les jours, mais d'un shampooing que vous devriez utiliser une fois par mois ou lorsque vos cheveux sont très sales.Il s'agit d'un shampooing très décapant si vous l'utilisez à chaque lavage. Cela dit, ce shampooing fonctionne très bien pour moi et mes enfants, nos cheveux sont doux et propres, il est important d'utiliser un shampooing et un après-shampooing hydratants après avoir utilisé ce shampooing afin de ne pas avoir les cheveux secs. Il élimine très bien les accumulations de produits et les salissures. Il sort de la bouteille sous la forme d'un liquide clair semblable à de l'eau, mais il mousse bien et se rince facilement. L'embout est très utile pour approcher le produit du cuir chevelu afin de le nettoyer en profondeur. Je l'achèterai à nouveau.

Loving this product to the core.It is great for washing your hair during an emergency if you have not oiled your hair in days and yet it feels dirty and greasy, you can always use this shampoo for a quick wash to strip away all the dirt yet let you natural oils not be stripped away

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product nice and gentle in my hair but very effective.
